sources.title: Chloe & Theo | Full Drama Movie | True Story | Theo Ikummaq
sources.description:
Chloe & Theo - Based on true events, a young woman meets an Inuit Eskimo who was sent by his elders to provide a message of change. With the help of a kind lawyer, they present his story to the United Nations.
2015.  Stars: Theo Ikummaq, Dakota Johnson, Ashley Springer

metadata.Plot: Theo, an Inuit from the Arctic, travels to New York City to warn world leaders about the catastrophic impact of global warming on the planet. Upon arrival he meets a homeless girl named Chloe, who has an unusual vigor for life, is mildly delusional, and completely obsessed by Bruce Lee. Together, they will save the world.
metadata.Actors: Theo Ikummaq, Dakota Johnson, Ashley Springer
